Package game.actions

package game.actions
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    game
     
  • Class
    Description
    AttackAction
    This class is adapted from the Huntsman demo given with the FIT2099 engine Class representing an action to attack Note that the attacker must have a weapon, e.g., an intrinsic weapon or a weapon item.
    Buyable
    Represents something that can be bought from a Merchant.
    BuyAction<T extends Item & Buyable>
    A generic buy action for any item that is both a Buyable and an Item.
    ConsumeAction
    An action that allows an actor to consume a Consumable item.
    CureCreatureAction
    Represents an action to cure a CurableCreature using the Talisman.
    CureGroundAction
    Represents an action to cure an infested ground tile using the Talisman.
    ListenAction
    Represents an action where an actor listens to another actor's monologue.
    LLMDialogueAction
    An Action that represents a dialogue spoken by an LLM (Large Language Model) such as Gemini.
    PlantAction
    Represents an action to plant a seed in the game.
    TeleportAction
    Action for teleporting between locations.
